description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
name of data subset – can include different experiments within data set/ different training conditions/ pre-test data/ etc
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/orangutan

familiarization- participants were presented with a functional and a non-functional tool where they have to choose the correct (functional) one/ functional_for_non functional- participants were asked to exchange a functional for a non functional tool/ initial_choice/ choice_trials/ trading-control/ identical_trials_tool/ endowment_trial_ tool_a or b (described in glossary experiment 1)
location of the type of tool described in the tool column
whether the participant engage in trading during the course of the trial
whether the participant complete all the trial steps
